{{ardayearheader|462|463|464|465|466|467|468}}
==Spring==
* [[Beren]] hears [[Lúthien]] singing and awakes from his trance. They fall in love.<ref name="Beren">{{S|Beren}}</ref>
* [[Thingol]] commands [[Beren]] to return with a [[Silmaril]] in exchange for [[Lúthien]]'s hand in marriage. [[Quest for the Silmaril]].<ref name="Beren"/>

==Autumn==
* [[Beren]] departs [[Nargothrond]] with [[Finrod]] and ten companions (including [[Edrahil]]). Finrod appoints [[Orodreth]] as regent.<ref name="Beren"/>
* Arriving at [[Tol-in-Gaurhoth]], Beren, Finrod and companions are captured by [[Sauron]].<ref name="Beren"/>
* [[Lúthien]] leaves [[Doriath]] seeking [[Beren]]; she encounters [[Celegorm]] and [[Curufin]] who take her to [[Nargothrond]]. She escapes Nargothrond with the aid of [[Huan]].<ref name="Beren"/>
* Death of [[Finrod]] and his ten companions in Tol-in-Gaurhoth.<ref name="Beren"/>
* [[Huan]] and [[Lúthien]] arrive at [[Tol-in-Gaurhoth]]. Huan kills [[Draugluin]] and defeats wolf-Sauron in battle; Sauron flees in the form of a [[Vampires|vampire]] and goes to [[Taur-nu-Fuin]].<ref name="Beren"/>
* [[Celegorm]] and [[Curufin]] are banished from [[Nargothrond]] and subsequently attack Beren and Lúthien. Huan betrays his master out of love for Lúthien. Beren leaves for [[Angband]].<ref name="Beren"/>

==Unknown==
* [[Brandir]] is born.<ref>{{WJ|14}}, p. 237</ref>

{{references}}
